targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 1

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 1

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT TOP 100 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases] WHERE
  $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT TOP 100 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases] WHERE
  $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],alm.[OpenedOn])) avgTTT,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTQ,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateIncident])) avgTTI,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateIncident],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTM,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateMitigated],c.[DateClosed])) avgTTV,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateEarliestEvidence],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
	JOIN
  (SELECT atc.CaseID,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToCase] atc JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am ON atc.AlarmID = am.AlarmID) alm
    ON c.[CaseID] = alm.[CaseID]
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],alm.[OpenedOn])) avgTTT,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTQ,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateIncident])) avgTTI,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateIncident],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTM,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateMitigated],c.[DateClosed])) avgTTV,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateEarliestEvidence],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
	JOIN
  (SELECT atc.CaseID,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToCase] atc JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am ON atc.AlarmID = am.AlarmID) alm
    ON c.[CaseID] = alm.[CaseID]
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC
